Cyclops readme.

Controls:

to change the combat and normal mode press 1 or 2
(most actions available in combat mode).


moving - directional arrows
c - look around (still mode)/roar (battle mode)
mouse 1 - attack1 
mouse 2 - attack2 
mouse 3 - attack3 
p - defence
space - jump
u - hit
die1 - i
die2 - o

I hope you will enjoy =)
